name: Jinx
description: Jinx, the court jester, has entertained the royal family of the planet Ploog for years with his jokes, japes and juggling. Harbouring ambitions to be a famous magician, Jinx's moment of destiny arrives one day when a band of villainous pirates kidnaps the royal family and casts an evil hex across the land. Using magical powers, Jinx's journey will take him through the six realms of Ploog, overcoming tricks and traps in his quest to save the kingdom.
